title: I need help finding a purchasable Eigenstate
content:
We have had this font for years but it has grown corrupt. I am looking to purchase a new version but I can't seem to track it down so came to you all for help. It was named Eigenstate. And the year on it is 1997.

Can you help?

Thanks!  
Lia

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20141024141318im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Eignestate.jpg)
author: Lia

comments.content: My research shows it to be a Garage Font - it is not listed at MY Fonts or the Garage Font site but you might try e-mailing Garage Fonts and asking if they still sell it. (1994 GarageFonts designed by Rodney Shelden Fehsenfeld )
[Rodney Shelden Fehsenfeld](http://web.archive.org/web/20141024141318/http:/www.typophile.com/wiki/Rodney%20Shelden%20Fehsenfeld) removed all of his fonts from the market, so I fear the worst...

The bald man speaks the sad truth. Alternatives:

[Corporate URW](http://web.archive.org/web/20141024141318/http:/www.fontshop.com/showfont.cfm?fid=UR.121167.0.0)  
 [Kamaro](http://web.archive.org/web/20141024141318/http:/www.fontshop.com/showfont.cfm?fid=GF.112195.0.0)  
 [Shimano Square](http://web.archive.org/web/20141024141318/http:/www.fontshop.com/showfont.cfm?fid=FB.9432.0.0)  
 [Changeling](http://web.archive.org/web/20141024141318/http:/www.fontshop.com/showfont.cfm?fid=MSF.118743.0.0)
So is there any other way to get this font? It is part of my compnay logo and I just had a hardrive crash and lost all of my fonts. PLEASE SAY YES! Lia tell me if you have any news.

Hope this doesn't sound disrespectful of the original author's work, but it doesn't seem too hard to recreate the look of the font. If you say it's part of the company logo, why not redraw the characters needed? It's even a good chance to make improvements that are specific of the logo.

greetings all --

if lia is still looking she can now find me as i've recently created an member account here.

i have reactivated my interests.  
any previously licensed typefaces are available directly through me.

i will speaking at Typecon/Seattle this AUG. as well being panelist to a forum (or 2?).

yours, rodney shelden fehsenfeld
Great to see you here, Rodney! And to see you in person in [Seattle](http://web.archive.org/web/20141024141318/http:/typecon.com/).

Hello, Mr. Fehsenfeld! (I hope you read this within the next days...)

Is there a way to contact you directly?  
You wrote: 'any previously licensed typefaces are available directly through me' - and we urgently need to purchase a typeface from you!

It would be great if we could get a possibility to reach you personally!

Thank you!

Jeanette
The contact link doesn't appear there at this time

right, I tried it several times but there seems to be no possibility to get in contact here. And searching through the net for other possibilities wasn't very successful either...

So I wrote this here...
Ah, OK. I'll ask Tamye and let you know.

I also am looking for this font Eigenstate. I may have it but it is on a zip disc and need to get it transfered. I'd be happy as a tea cake to purchase it. Anyone still on this?

B
